mapper.select: SELECT id, category_id categoryId, item_type itemType, title, sell_point sellPoint, price, num, barcode, image, status, priority, created_time createdTime, created_user createdUser, modified_time modifiedTime, modified_user modifiedUser FROM t_goods LIMIT #{offset}, 25
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_goods WHERE category_id=#{categoryId} AND status=1 AND num>0
SELECT id, category_id categoryId, item_type itemType, title, sell_point sellPoint, price, num, barcode, image, status, priority FROM t_goods WHERE id=#{id} AND status=1 AND num>0
SELECT id, title, num FROM t_goods WHERE item_type=#{itemType} ORDER BY id DESC
